00045 #include <QModelIndex>

00057 NodeNameDelegate::NodeNameDelegate( SceneModel* sceneModel,  QObject* parent)
00058  : QItemDelegate(parent), m_pModel( sceneModel )
00059 {
00060         Trace trace( "NodeNameDelegate::NodeNameDelegate", false );
00061 } 
00062 
00063 NodeNameDelegate::~NodeNameDelegate()
00064 {
00065         
00066 }
00067 
00068 QWidget* NodeNameDelegate::createEditor(QWidget* parent, const QStyleOptionViewItem& /*option*/, const QModelIndex& /*index*/) const
00069 {
00070         Trace trace( "NodeNameDelegate::createEditor", false );
00071         QLineEdit  *editor = new QLineEdit (parent);
00072         connect ( editor, SIGNAL (editingFinished()), this, SLOT (commitChangesAndClose()) );
00073         return editor;
00074 
00075 }
00076 
00077 void NodeNameDelegate::setEditorData(QWidget *editor,
00078                                      const QModelIndex &index) const
00079 {
00080         Trace trace( "NodeNameDelegate::setEditorData", false );
00081         QString value = index.model()->data(index, Qt::DisplayRole).toString();
00082 
00083         QLineEdit  *textEdit = static_cast<QLineEdit *>(editor);
00084         
00085         SoNode* coinNode = m_pModel->NodeFromIndex( index )->GetNode();
00086         
00087         QString nodeName;
00088         if ( coinNode->getName() == SbName() )
00089                 nodeName = QString( coinNode->getTypeId().getName().getString() );
00090         else
00091                 nodeName = QString( coinNode->getName().getString() );
00092                 
00093         textEdit->setText( nodeName );
00094 
00095 } 
00096 
00097 void NodeNameDelegate::setModelData(QWidget* editor, QAbstractItemModel* /*model*/, const QModelIndex& index ) const
00098 {
00099         Trace trace( "NodeNameDelegate::setModelData", false );
00100         QLineEdit  *textEdit = static_cast<QLineEdit *>(editor);
00101         
00102         SoNode* coinNode =m_pModel->NodeFromIndex( index )->GetNode();
00103         
00104         SbName* coinName = new SbName( textEdit->text().toStdString().c_str() );
00105         coinNode->setName( *coinName );
00106 
00107 } 
00108 
00109 void NodeNameDelegate::commitChangesAndClose()
00110 {
00111         QLineEdit *editor = qobject_cast< QLineEdit* >(sender());
00112         emit commitData(editor);
00113         emit closeEditor(editor);
00114 }
